page.title: 09WORK IN TYDD ST.GILES
page.content: Most of the people in or round Tydd St.Giles are farmers or farmworkers because there is a lot of farmland. Some people do different jobs like electricians and lorry drivers but most of the people are farmers. Most of the land is ploughed or drilled by machinery.That's why we need mechanics to mend the ones that have broken down. Not all of the people in Tydd St. Giles work on the land because some work at the Diesel factory in Peterbourgh and at the Metal Box factory in Wisbech. Some of the people work in offices in Wisbech. Some of the people in Tydd St. Giles are out of work because there aren't enough jobs.The only industry in the village is a small lorry-body works,and young people find that work is hard to get.
